We're drowning in disconnected tools:\n• Google Sheets for deal tracking\n• Calendly for showings\n• Mailchimp for drip campaigns\n• A basic CRM that nobody updates\n\nCan monday.com consolidate this? Specifically need:\n• Deal pipeline with stages (Lead → Showing → Offer → Under Contract → Closed)\n• Property listings database\n• Commission tracking and split calculations\n• Client communication log\n• Transaction checklist (inspections, appraisals, title work, etc.)\n• Agent performance dashboards\n\nAny real estate professionals using monday.com successfully?"]}]}]
